ing: 3 cloves garlic, or more to taste
des: "This is like garlic sauce times tzatziki sauce. To the power of garlic. I like mine super garlicky but you may adjust your garlic to taste. This tastes amazing on everything."
ins: Combine coconut milk yogurt, cucumber, lemon juice, garlic cloves, sea salt, and dill in a food processor; blend until well mixed.
